languages.text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} выстрелом из пистолета, следующая атака из пистолета не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Once per turn, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用手枪造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，下次手枪攻击不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}只能触发一次。
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用手枪造成暴击时，还可以使用此手枪再次攻击，额外攻击不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}
当装备者使用手枪造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，下次手枪攻击不消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此效果每回合只能触发一次。

languages.text: Один раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} выстрелом из пистолета, следующая атака из пистолета не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} выстрелом из пистолета, вторая атака из пистолета не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} выстрелом из пистолета, вторая атака из пистолета не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者がピストルで{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えると、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に1回、ピストルを使った次の攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0となる。
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ピストルでクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を出す度、ピストルでの次の攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0となる。
1ターンに1度、使用者がピストルで{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えると、ピストルを使った次の攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が0となる。

languages.text: Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cuando el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} con una pistola, el siguiente ataque con pistola tendrá un coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico con una pistola, puede lanzar un segundo ataque con ella con coste de 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger (einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}) einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} mit einer Pistole erzielt, kostet der nächste Angriff mit einer Pistole 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit einer Pistole landet, kostet ein zweiter Angriff mit einer Pistole 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, quand l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à l'aide d'un pistolet, sa prochaine attaque au pistolet lui coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique à l'aide d'un pistolet, sa deuxième attaque au pistolet lui coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir tabancayla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde tabanca ile yapılan bir sonraki saldırısı 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar (her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} bir kez).
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
